overview: 4 pretty young women sell their charms in a beautiful mansion. Summertime is coming and the business is tough - everyone is on vacation! They decide to rent a mobile home to seek customers wherever they are. A steamy journey through France and Italy which offers an abundance of XXX scenes, in which Olinka and her friends go nympho, proving that they really like it! A XXX French cinema triumph successfully released on June 16th, 1985
title: Take Me Deep
